body:
File->function map for keyed_store_ic_elements_transition (source-anchored quick index)

This document lists the most important files and functions relevant to keyed store ICs and elements-kind transitions, with concise anchors for quick navigation.

IC core:
- src/ic/ic.cc
  - KeyedStoreIC::UpdateStoreElement (ic/ic.cc:2273)
  - KeyedStoreIC::StoreElementHandler (ic/ic.cc:2413-2548)
  - RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_KeyedStoreIC_Miss) (ic/ic.cc:3113)
  - RUNTIME_FUNCTION(Runtime_ElementsTransitionAndStoreIC_Miss) (ic/ic.cc:3242)
  - IC::SetCache / ConfigureVectorState (ic/ic.cc:~2000-2200)

Builtins and handlers:
- src/builtins/builtins-handler-gen.cc
  - HandlerBuiltinsAssembler::Generate_StoreFastElementIC (builtins/builtins-handler-gen.cc:284-352)
  - HandlerBuiltinsAssembler::Generate_ElementsTransitionAndStore (builtins/builtins-handler-gen.cc:141-193)
  - DispatchByElementsKind / DispatchForElementsKind (builtins/builtins-handler-gen.cc)

Accessor assembler (CSA trampolines and handler decoding):
- src/ic/accessor-assembler.cc
  - AccessorAssembler::KeyedStoreIC (ic/accessor-assembler.cc:4131)
  - Handler decoding: DecodeWord32<StoreHandler::KindBits>(handler_word) (ic/accessor-assembler.cc:579-732)

CodeStubAssembler helpers and typed array support:
- src/codegen/code-stub-assembler.cc
  - CodeStubAssembler::EmitElementStore (codegen/code-stub-assembler.cc:14094)
  - CodeStubAssembler::EmitElementStoreTypedArray / PrepareValueForWriteToTypedArray (codegen/code-stub-assembler.cc:13646-14037)
  - CodeStubAssembler::CheckForCapacityGrow / TryGrowElementsCapacity (codegen/code-stub-assembler.cc:14340 & 6653)
  - CodeStubAssembler::CopyElementsOnWrite (codegen/code-stub-assembler.cc:14340-14359)

Elements conversion and growth:
- src/objects/elements.cc
  - TransitionElementsKindImpl, ConvertElementsWithCapacity, GrowCapacityAndConvertImpl, BasicGrowCapacityAndConvertImpl (objects/elements.cc:991-1114; objects/elements.cc:2264 & 4937)

Handler configuration and bitfields:
- src/ic/handler-configuration.h and -inl.h
  - KindBits, AllowOutOfBoundsBits, ElementsKindBits, KeyedAccessStoreModeBits encodings and helper functions (ic/handler-configuration.h:67-369; ic/handler-configuration-inl.h:191-218)

Compiler lowering & consumption:
- src/compiler/simplified-lowering.cc (simplified-lowering.cc:4746-4751)
- src/compiler/js-native-context-specialization.cc (js-native-context-specialization.cc:2288-2327)
- src/compiler/js-typed-lowering.cc
- src/compiler/access-info.cc (access-info.cc)

Maglev builder & nodes:
- src/maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc
  - TryBuildElementStoreOnJSArrayOrJSObject (maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc:6224)
  - BuildTransitionElementsKindOrCheckMap (maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc:4367)
  - TryBuildElementAccess (maglev/maglev-graph-builder.cc:6365-6484)

Runtime/deopt & entrypoints:
- src/runtime/runtime.h and runtime/runtime-*.cc for TransitionElementsKind, KeyedStoreIC_Miss, ElementsTransitionAndStoreIC_Miss (runtime/runtime.h:803; runtime/runtime-array.cc:17 for TransitionElementsKind)
- src/deoptimizer/* for deopt continuation infrastructure

Internal RAG citations included in this map: [keyed_store_ic_elements_transition.overview_topology, keyed_store_ic_elements_transition.handlers_catalog, keyed_store_ic_elements_transition.elements_accessor_transitions, keyed_store_ic_elements_transition.compiler_consumption, keyed_store_ic_elements_transition.guard_assumptions_invariants, keyed_store_ic_elements_transition.vuln_hypotheses]
explanation: Index mapping of files to the key functions and anchors used across the other Stage 1 summaries for fast lookup during Stage 3 deep dives.
